description: In a postapocalyptic world, rag-doll robots hide in fear from dangerous machines out to exterminate them, until a brave newcomer joins the group.
actors: Elijah Wood, John C. Reilly, Jennifer Connelly, Christopher Plummer

description: Unlucky delinquents Sachin and Zaramud stumble into a series of random misadventures when they attempt to collect a debt for their boss.
actors: Kunal Khemu, Boman Irani, Soha Ali Khan, Cyrus Broacha
